name: @ercdex/aqueduct
description: Aqueduct: API and Socket client for ERC dEX
author: ERC dEX

scripts.deploy: npm version patch -m "Release v%s" && npm publish
scripts.postversion: git push origin master && git push --follow-tags
scripts.build:lib: rimraf dist && npm run generate:client && npm run build
scripts.build:lib:fresh: npm run fetch:swagger && npm run fetch:events && npm run build:lib
scripts.start:docs: npm run generate:docs && cd docs && npm start
scripts.build:docs: npm run generate:docs && cd docs && npm run build:prod
scripts.generate:docs: npm run build:lib && rimraf ./docs/src/client && typedoc --ignoreCompilerErrors --excludeExternals --excludePrivate --excludeProtected --theme themes/custom --readme none --name "Aqueduct JavaScript Client" --mode modules --out ./docs/src/client ./src/generated/aqueduct.ts
